Monstercat | Web Designer/Developer | Vancouver, Canada | Full Time

Monstercat is Canada's largest independent electronic music record label. Founders Mike Darlington (CEO) and Ari Paunonen (CSO) started the label in 2011, and since moving to Vancouver, British Columbia, have built a roster of world-renowned artists. The companyâ€™s mission is to connect these artists with fans in a way that nurtures the spirit of sharing and family.

We develop software that allows us to power our internal workflow, serve the public, and power an industry. We are looking for someone who knows the ins and outs of web development and has an affinity for design. These projects will allow you to create your own solutions to complicated systems and work on websites used by millions of our fans. This includes the development of internal tools, promotional material, and our own web services.
